front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks-Media Access Control (MAC) Security

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: How all or part of a network can be secured transparently to peer protocol entities that use the MAC Service provided by IEEE 802(R) LANs to communicate is specified in this standard. AC security (MACsec) provides connectionless user data confidentiality, data frame integrity, and data origin authenticity.
